title: Bug
body: So everything works when I load up the game menu but here is my problem when I click play and pick normal draft its just a black screen when I click launch and I can't do anything.  Any solutions will help.

replies.body:
Most of the time, any black screen in the client will lead to a problem with your connection reaching our servers properly. This is often caused or exacerbated by network settings that don't quite play well with League, so a good place to start is by working through our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if this was able to resolve your problem.
